intent_result.merged_query: 查询 2025-2026-1 学期各专业的平均分，并按降序排列取前 10 名
intent_result.rewritten_query: 查询 2025-2026-1 学期各专业的平均分，并按降序排列取前 10 名

sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT major.major_name, score.score_value FROM score JOIN student ON score.student_id = student.id JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE score.term = '2025-2026-1' AND score.is_deleted = 0 AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.major_name, AVG(base.score_value) AS avg_score FROM base GROUP BY base.major_name ORDER BY avg_score DESC LIMIT 10

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“学期（如 2025-2026-1）”映射
